summary: Resident Evil is a popular horror video game series and media franchise. It started in 1996 with a game where players survive in a zombie-filled world. The franchise has many games, movies, and other cool stuff. The games have changed over time, from scary survival horror to action-packed shooting. The movies star Milla Jovovich and have made a lot of money, even though critics didn't love them. Resident Evil is the top-selling horror game series, with fans all over the world.
title: Resident Evil
